DataElement.preferredName: Current Coded Disease or Disorder Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The current abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The numerically coded term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._A condition or state at a particular time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person at a particular time. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Diagnostic tests fail to detect presence of disease.

Concepts.definition: Diagnostic tests fail to detect presence of disease.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.: Cannot distinguish between two or more possible values in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.
Cannot distinguish between two or more possible values in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:A condition or state at a particular time.
